moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.
